content: If a car travels at an average speed of 45 miles per hour, how long will it take to travel 540 miles?

If a car is moving at an average speed of 45 miles per hour, and it needs to cover a distance of 540 miles, we can calculate the time it will take using the formula:

Time = Distance / Speed

Plugging in the values:

Time = 540 miles / 45 miles per hour

Time = 12 hours

So, it will take 12 hours for the car to travel 540 miles at an average speed of 45 miles per hour.
